available \/ Driver Not accepted the request. Try after sometime
Thanks for the Ride! Please check the vehicle whether the passenger has left any of the belongings in your vehicle.
Either there is no network connectivity or server is not available. Please try again later.
Couldn\'t get the current location. Please wait.
Could not connect to Google API Client
Your session has expired. Please re-login!

All drivers must agree to pay ZipRyde a 15% commission on all trips. this commission must be paid through the CashApp.
 •All drivers must agree that all customers of ZipRyde can rate the quality of service provided by each driver. 
 • All drivers are subject to the rates established by ZipRyde, which does not include surcharge or toll charges. 
 • Incase of lost items left behind inside the vehicle, drivers can contact the customers directly in order to return lost items. If the member cannot be reached, driver must bring lost items to the ZipRyde office and they will be mailed to member. 
 Driver requirements: All drivers must meet the following requirements, which include; 
 • Necessary permits and regulations City, State,and Airport authority Regulations. 
 • Personal hygiene, cleanliness,Courteous and professional behavior at all times. 
 • Clear and open line of communication with passenger at all times. 
Agree to a clear understanding of the passenger fare at the beginning of every trip, Assuring that no passenger is overcharged.all drivers must have SquareCash/CashApp, and paypal accounts. Accept all Airline vouchers given by customers. 
 Agree to follow all ZipRyde rules and regulations

website www.zipryde.com 
 Email help@zipryde.com 
 Tel 1-800-609-9070	 press 3 for help 


 Please use the below app to calculate your toll fees
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=itoll.com.ntta

Disclaimers; Limitation of Liability; Indemnity. 
DISCLAIMER.

YOU AGREE TO WAIVE ZIPRYDE AND ITS OFFICERS. YOU FURTHER AGREED THAT ZIPRYDE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES, LIABILITY OR LOSSES ARISING OUT OF: 
(i) YOUR USE OF OR RELIANCE ON THE SERVICES OR YOUR INABILITY TO ACCESS OR USE THE SERVICES; OR 
(ii) ANY TRANSACTION OR RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN YOU AND ANY THIRD PARTY PROVIDER, EVEN IF ZIPRYDE HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. ZIPRYDE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR DELAY OR FAILURE IN PERFORMANCE RESULTING FROM CAUSES BEYOND ZIPRYDE'S REASONABLE CONTROL. THE SERVICES MAY BE USED BY YOU TO REQUEST AND SCHEDULE TRANSPORTATION, GOODS, OR LOGISTICS SERVICES WITH THIRD PARTY

PROVIDERS, BUT YOU AGREE THAT ZIPRYDE HAS NO RESPONSIBILITY OR LIABILITY TO YOU RELATED TO ANY TRANSPORTATION, GOODS OR LOGISTICS SERVICES PROVIDED TO YOU BY THIRD PARTY PROVIDERS OTHER THAN AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THESE TERMS. THE LIMITATIONS AND DISCLAIMER IN THIS SECTION DO NOT PURPORT TO LIMIT LIABILITY OR ALTER YOUR RIGHTS AS A CONSUMER THAT CANNOT BE EXCLUDED UNDER APPLICABLE LAW. BECAUSE SOME STATES OR JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OF OR THE LIMITATION OF LIABILITY FOR CONSEQUENTIAL OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES, IN SUCH STATES OR JURISDICTIONS, ZIPRYDE'S LIABILITY SHALL BE LIMITED TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW. THIS PROVISION SHALL HAVE NO EFFECT ON ZIPRYDE'S CHOICE OF LAW PROVISION SET FORTH BELOW. 
Indemnity. 
You agree to indemnify and hold ZipRyde and its affiliates and their officers, directors, employees, and agents harmless from any and all claims, demands, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including attorneys' fees), arising out of or in connection with: 
(i) your use of the Services or services or goods obtained through your use of the Services; 
(ii) your breach or violation of any of these Terms; 
(iii) ZipRyde's use of your User Content; or 
(iv) your violation of the rights of any third party, including Third Party Providers.
